quranAppsDirectory.title: Quran Apps Directory
quranAppsDirectory.shortDescription: Objective: To serve Muslims worldwide by providing a platform to collect and categorize digital applications related to the Quran. The project aims to facilitate access to the best technological solutions that support the Book of Allah, including reading, recitation, memorization, interpretation, Tajweed, and other Quranic fields.
quranAppsDirectory.roles: Technical Development, UI/UX Design, Research and Data Collection, Sharia Specialists to ensure the accuracy of the applications.

advancedSearch.title: Advanced Quran Search Technology
advancedSearch.shortDescription: A project aimed at developing advanced search technologies in the Quranic text, to facilitate access to verses and Quranic information with high accuracy and speed.
advancedSearch.roles: Technical Development, Research and Data Collection, Sharia Specialists.

quranContentManagementSystem.title: Quran Content Management System
quranContentManagementSystem.shortDescription: A project aimed at developing a content management system for the Quranic text, to facilitate access to verses and Quranic information with high accuracy and speed.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: What others ask about the community

join.title: Why would I want to join the Itqan community?
join.answer: The Itqan community is a great place to be surrounded by passionate developers who are looking to develop their skills and serve a greater faith-based purpose. Through connecting with like-minded others, and getting feedback on your work and software.

support.title: Will I get professional support?
support.answer: Yes, you'll have access to the community discussion board to get feedback, review your software, and learn from others.

topics.title: What topics can I ask about here?
topics.answer: The Itqan community is dedicated to professional and amateur programmers. The best questions in our community usually contain a portion of source code, but if your question covers a specific programming problem, programming algorithm, or commonly used programming tools; and is a practical, answerable, unique problem in software development, you're in the right place to ask what's on your mind.
